original: intros. unfold refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout. intros net h st' ps' gd out d l Htimeout Helection Hinvariant Hreachable Hst' Hps'. apply allEntries_log_matching_inductive. split. - apply entries_contiguous_nw_invariant with (net:=net). + auto. + auto. - eapply entries_sorted_nw_invariant; eauto. + auto. + auto.
